item.description:
Let's gather to celebrate the "last official" weekend of summer with the ideal New England summer dinner--lobster with the fixings.
Exchange Street Bistro in Malden Malden, http://exchangestreet... offers a twin boiled lobster dinner on this season's three-course prixe fixe menu. The dinner is $24.99 and includes salad, lobsters, mussels, corn on the cob, potatoes and sorbet. For non-seafood people, there is a complete menu as well as a T-Bone steak option included in the prixe fixe menu.
Exchange Street also has pretty impressive martini bar and lively atmosphere.
Anyone inspired to include some Baby Boomer trivia? Bring questions!

We can follow up dinner with Saturday night at the movies! From there we'll head over to the Showcase Theater in Woburn, 25 Middlesex Canal Park, Woburn, MA, located at exit 35 on route 128.

group.name: Boston Baby Boomers Meetup Group-Social Fun

item.name: Lobster, Martinis, and a Movie
